text: Nhung nguoi co uc tin khong uoc phep lay nhung ke vo uc tin lam nhung nguoi bao ho thay vi nhung nguoi co uc tin. Nguoi nao lam vay thi Allah hoan toan vo can voi y ngoai tru truong hop cac nguoi lo so cac moi hoa tu ho. Allah canh bao cac nguoi ve ban than Ngai. Qua that, cac nguoi phai tro ve trinh dien Allah
